description: Looking for an easy lamb souvlaki recipe that's healthier than the usual takeaway version? Try this one for a lazy Sunday lunch or dinner with friends.
name: Healthier Souvlaki Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 540g pkt lamb leg steaks, fat trimmed, cut into 2cm pieces
2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.5 bunch mint, leaves picked (plus extra to serve)
1 red onion, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Place lamb, zest, half the oil and threequarters of the garlic in a glass or ceramic bowl, tossing to coat. Thread lamb onto 4 wooden or metal skewers.
Use remaining oil to grease large chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook skewers, turning, for 3 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, mint and remaining garlic in a bowl. Season with pepper.
Serve skewers on wraps with tzatziki, cucumber, onion, tomato, tabouli and extra mint leaves, and seasoned with pepper.
